title: Sick of getting abused because I play Heimer.
body:
Every game. I get told to kys, learn to play a skilled champ, I am a noob and many other abuses by my team or the enemy player.

I don't mind a little bit of banter but game after game of the abuse just gets too much.

I just don't know if I can continue to play league any more.

This is not a troll post, this really happens.

Why am I not allowed to play Heimer when other people are allowed to lock in their favourite champ and not get berated for it. 

I just don't understand this community. I never had this on EUW at all.

replies.body:
Heimer is a good champ just keep sticking at it because you can definitely climb to high elo with it! just keep practicing and learn as much as you can, watch guides & learn tips for mid lane and top lane heimer 

Good Luck  :)

heimerdinger is one of those toplaners I like to take mid; the other is cho'gath since he ruins zed and yasou and he's pretty good in most midlane matchups bar syndra and brand.. Heimer mid is so much more annoying to play against and if done right he can just lockdown the enemy mid and stop them from roaming with push pressure and force the entire enemy team into grouping too early giving your team the advantage.

Yeah just mute them. When I play Garen top, if I start dominating my lane I get toxicity about how easy Garen is to play, he is an op champ, he is broken, anyone can play Garen play someone hard and see how you go.... I just laugh to myself and continue to dominate lane. Then late game, single out the toxic ones EVERY team fight and watch them get madder at life xD

I enjoy reading the hate tbh, I get a good laugh from it. I never reply, just enjoy the read. But if it gets to you, best bet is to mute them and enjoy your game.

See you on the rift
{{champion:74}}

There happens to be a negative connotation around champions like Heimerdinger and Teemo. There is not much that can be done about it, the best thing you can do is simply mute the players causing you problems (eliminating the source of threat). League of Legends is full of toxic players, every one of us must endure them. Keep your head up friend, don't let the haters get to you! Heimerdinger is a great champion and we should all strive for champion equality. {{champion:74}}

Sadly enough, OCE is far less toxic than NA.

It's because Heimer is probably the easiest champion for level 30's to play and they feel like, why should their champ get beaten by someone so easy to them, it's a pride issue, people can't admit it's a game.

add cho'gath, shaco, veigar, thresh and zilean to your pool then, you'll hear that your champion is broken and no skill 300% more I garentee you (see what i did there?).
 I love it when people tell me this, like sure they're easy to play but why is that their business? when people say this they get tilted so hard and all you have to do is agree with them and be friendly and you've now won the mindgame section of your lane.
 I think it's the funniest way to troll, being all sympathetic and friendly and agreeing with their rant whilst they get saltier and more tilted with each all chat comment and you even get honoured after not reported.   XD

 I am not a good person but I never flame or act toxic and I act super nice; which possibly makes me the worst kind of troll.

Yeah it's dumb, I don't agree with it I'm just trying to explain their logic, the other day I got mad and said something like 'It's a game and I'm trying to have fun, I'm allowed to play a champion if I want to, lay off." because people don't have a right to dictate to you on what you're playing
Just keep playing him, you are better off playing a champ you know than being forced to play one you dont.
Imagine how Yasuos feel, you got it easy man! Yasuo's are the scum of the earth and they get treated like it too!
